attributes.action: Vote on a NEW Prime Minister before 3 months.
attributes.additional_details: with effect of david cameron giving notice of quitting as Prime Minister, i hereby ask for a New General Election to be brought forward with immediate effect.
attributes.background: with the news of david cameron quitting as pm, we the public should have a vote for a NEW Prime Minister, a new general election should be made available immediately, not having to wait for 3 months.
